name: RPGBot
body:
# RPGBot
A RPG Bot for Discord.

## Using the bot

To use the bot, you'll have to first invite it to your Discord server. You can do that by clicking [here](https://discordapp.com/oauth2/authorize?&client_id=170915256833540097&scope=bot&permissions=0).

### Commands

All commands are prefixed with ``#!``, ``@DiscordRPG`` or ``DiscordRPG``

For example, ``#!help`` shows ``Hi! I'm DiscordRPG! For a list of the commands I recognize, you can type #!commands, DiscordRPG commands or @DiscordRPG commands``
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
